name: E-Sales Man
description:
What is E- Sales Man?

E-Sales Man is a game where you buy products like apples, coconuts, oil and later on even tanks from different countries using different currencies later on in the game to sell those products to other countries for more money.  Be careful not to go bankrupt and in debt.

What's the currency in the game?

In the game you have 7 different types of currency each of those types works only in some countries for example RUB (Rubles) work only in Russia but there is a middle man currency as well which is Gold you need Gold the most to pass the game and start earning Bit coins and later on after the game will be updated you will have many more opportunities where you need gold to have more fun.

How to get Gold?

You can exchange your currency which you got from different countries after selling and buying things and additionally on the beginning you start with 100 gold.

How to launch the game?

After you unzip the file go into it and open the game which is called in the file "game" its a app file and has a picture of a yellow dollar.

 Enjoy your gameplay !!
